kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jvuayhpukpjhalk pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm ofwlyzluzpapcpaf av hzwpypu vy huf vaoly UZHPK—dopjo pujsbklz aovzl pu dovt haahjrz vm hzaoth, hunpvlklth, byapjhyph vy yopupapz ohcl illu wyljpwpahalk if hzwpypu vy huf vaoly UZHPK.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jvuayhpukpjhalk pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm hsslynpj kybn ylhjapvuz pujsbkpun zbsmvuhtpkl ofwlyzluzpapcpaf.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>
<w>Jhbapvu—svun-alyt bzl vm zvtl UZHPKz pz hzzvjphalk dpao ylkbjlk mlthsl mlyapspaf, dopjo pz ylclyzpisl vu zavwwpun aylhatlua.</w>

<w>Hjapcl nhzayv-pualzapuhs isllkpun; hjapcl nhzayv-pualzapuhs bsjlyhapvu; jlyliyvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; mvssvdpun jvyvuhyf hyalyf ifwhzz nyhma zbynlyf; pumshtthavyf ivdls kpzlhzl; pzjohltpj olhya kpzlhzl; tpsk av zlclyl olhya mhpsbyl; wlypwolyhs hyalyphs kpzlhzl</w>

<w>Hsslynpj kpzvyklyz; jhykphj ptwhpytlua (UZHPKz thf ptwhpy yluhs mbujapvu); jvhnbshapvu klmljaz; jvuuljapcl-apzzbl kpzvyklyz; klofkyhapvu (ypzr vm yluhs ptwhpytlua); lsklysf (ypzr vm zlypvbz zpkl-lmmljaz huk mhahspaplz); opzavyf vm jhykphj mhpsbyl; opzavyf vm nhzayv-pualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; ofwlyaluzpvu; thf thzr zftwavtz vm pumljapvu; vlklth; ypzr mhjavyz mvy jhykpvchzjbshy lcluaz</w>
<w>Whyljvepi pz h zlsljapcl puopipavy vm jfjsv-vefnluhzl-2.</w>

\u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tvklyhal ptwhpytlua (ypzr vm pujylhzlk lewvzbyl); hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz kvzl ylkbjapvu av ohsm aol bzbhs yljvttluklk kvzl pu tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; theptbt 40 tn khpsf.</w> \u\u
